name: Yoga - Hatha Traditional
description: There is much more in Hatha yoga practice than poses. In this series, we still explore practices aimed to improve our physical well-being through asanas (poses); we also introduce practices that include pranayama (breath expansion) techniques, and finally we experience the benefits of simple meditation techniques. The intention is awareness at a physical, mental and emotional level on as well as off the mat.
